# Zeitreihen Autokorrelation

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(timetk)
bike_sharing_daily %>% 
   select(dteday, cnt)  %>%
 # Change the columns name
    set_names(c("date", "value")) %>% 
  plot_time_series(date,value, .interactive = FALSE)
```


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(timetk)
bike_sharing_daily %>% 
   select(dteday, cnt)  %>%
 # Change the columns name
    set_names(c("date", "value")) %>% 
  plot_acf_diagnostics(date,value, .interactive = FALSE)
```




# Spatial Neighborhood

```{r}
library(spData)
library(sf)
library(spdep)
library(ggplot2)
map <- st_read(system.file("shapes/columbus.shp",
               package = "spData"), quiet = TRUE)
nb <- spdep::poly2nb(map, queen = TRUE)
head(nb)
plot(map)
```
